-	script	GlobalSpawnedBossId	-1,{
	end;
	
OnInit:
	setarray $all_boss_ids[0],2564,1090,1092,1088,1086,1059,1147,1159,1112,1630,1296,1312,1492,1038,1157,1511,1418,1388,1582,1096,1120,1090,1658,1046,1785,1087,1190,1039,1272,1871,1832,1751,1873,1956,2022,1087,1929,2564,3180,3181,2320,2321,2322,2317,2319,1087,1147,1190,1115,1086,1038,1159,1389,1046,1059,1150,1688,1039,1089,1092,1088,1096,1093,1120,1090,1980,1157,1112,1251,2068,1373,2156,1272,1630,1252,1779,1708,1623,1418,1312,1785,1734,1719,1768,2087,1751,2253,2255,1832,1874,3124,2942,2532,2529,2535,2533,2534,2959,2961,2131,3628,2996,2997,3029,3254,2187,2188,2189,2190,2998,2999,3000,3073,2194,2475,2476,3450,2542,3484,3474,3475,3473,3621,1646,1650,2239,1647,2241,2238,2240,2236,2235,2237,1651,1649,1648,1871,1873,1719,1492,1147,1688,1583,2068,3074,2156,2087,2165,1623,1389,1046,1272,1272,1150,1115,2253,1059,1147,2251,1039,1785,2249,1046,1272,2255,1418,1157,2202,1685,1734,1658,1630,1038,1511,2362,1885,1751,1150,1039,1086,1768,3741,2441,2442,1832,1112,1312,1251,1087,1190,1252,1059,1159,1917,1115,1785,1785,1785,1785;
